name: Astrocreep: Invasion!
description:
UPDATE: A completed version of the game... in 3D?
It could happen, but I need your help -- Donate when downloading this DEMO to help me develop THE 3D VERSION, thanks!
----------------------------------------
DESCRIPTION: This game is the 2nd in a series about an ALIEN THAT ASSIMILATES OTHER ORGANISMS ( LIKE "THE THING" ). Consider playing another in the series if this kind of subject interest you:



----------------------------------------

PRIMARY NOTES:

This game is in a DEMO STATE ( It's not done and won't ever be ) and SPACEBAR will BREAK THE GAME in some points, so just don't press it to be safe
To close out the WHITE FEEDBACK TEXT, hit TAB KEY
IMPORTANT: AFTER the 2nd MOVIE ( WHERE YOU GET YOUR WINGS ) THE GAME IS PRETTY MUCH OVER. YOU CAN CLICK AROUND TO SEE WHERE IT WOULD HAVE GONE, BUT THE DEVELOPERS DIDN'T GET TO FINISH IT.
-----------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------

WALK-THROUGH

Many people assume because it's a demo, that there aren't solutions to the puzzles. The game CAN BE BEATEN without using F1 to cheat and SWITCH FORMS. If you have trouble working out the solutions, follow these steps
